text.section: The principal office of the commission shall be located at the state capital, and it shall be kept open during the usual business hours.
The commission shall hold meetings at its principal office and at such other convenient places in the state as are expedient or necessary for the proper performance of its duties.

law.history: Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 82, sec. 12, effective July 15, 1982. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 379, sec. 14, effective April 1, 1979. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 3952-7.
